== Installing the latest release ==

=== Linux / *BSD ===
# [http://sourceforge.net/projects/pycam/files/ download] the archive of your choice
# install the [[Requirements|requirements]] for your system
# run <tt>./pycam</tt> in the PyCAM directory

=== Mac OS X ===
See [[Installation MacOS]] for details.

===  Windows ===
Use the [http://pycam.sourceforge.net/download.html standalone executable for Windows]. There are no further requirements.

If you want to use [[Parallel Processing on different Platforms|multiple CPU cores or distributed processing]], then you will need to use the [http://pycam.sourceforge.net/download.html dependency installer and the PyCAM installer package].

== Installing the development version ==
# install the [http://git-scm.com/ git] client (via your package manager or by [http://git-scm.com/downloads downloading] it)
# checkout the PyCAM repository: <tt>git clone git://pycam.git.sourceforge.net/gitroot/pycam/pycam</tt>
# install the [[Requirements|requirements]] for your system
# run <tt>scripts/pycam</tt> in the PyCAM directory
